actual condition: acute kidney disease with no current dialysis
atrial fibrillation (a-fib) or atrial flutter (or a-flutter)
chronic lung disease (copd, emphysema, or bronchitis)
head and neck cancer (this includes cancers of the mouth, sinuses, nose, or throat. this does not include brain cancer.)
other bone, joint, or muscle condition(s)

pulmonary embolism or deep vein thrombosis (dvt)

DC6 meaning: allergy or anaphylactic reaction to drug

actual condition: severe hearing loss or partial deafness in one or both ears
